commands.name: Show repository browser
commands.notes: Opens the Repository Browser window.

commands.name: Show remote hosted repositories
commands.notes: Show the Repository Browser and select the Remote section.

commands.name: Show/Hide sidebar
commands.notes: Toggle the current repository's sidebar (branches, tags, and more.)

commands.name: Show/Hide command history
commands.notes: Toggle the current repository's command history to view details.

commands.name: File status view
commands.notes: Switch to the file browser and commit preparation area.

commands.name: History view
commands.notes: Switch to the primary commit history browser area.

commands.name: Search view
commands.notes: Switch to the commit history search area.

commands.name: Fetch...
commands.notes: Retrieve the current repository's branches, tags, and history from the remote server.

commands.name: Unstage from index
commands.notes: Remove the selected item(s) from the staging area prior to committing.

commands.name: Update
commands.notes: Retrieve the current repository's state from the remote server.

commands.name: Repository settings...
commands.notes: Configure settings for the current repository.

commands.name: Refresh
commands.notes: Reload the current repository's commit history graph, file status, and build status.

commands.name: Refresh remote status
commands.notes: Reload the current repository's status from the remote server.

commands.name: Commit...
commands.notes: Go to current repository's File Status view, focus the message editor, and populate with a message template if available.

commands.name: Revert... *or* Reset...
commands.notes: Begin reverting one or more of the current repository's in-progress changes.

commands.name: Stash *or* Shelve
commands.notes: Save the current repository's in-progress changes for later use.

commands.name: Push...
commands.notes: Send local commits for the current repository to the remote server.

commands.name: Pull...
commands.notes: Retrieve any new commits for the current repository from the remote server.

commands.name: Update to... *or* Checkout...
commands.notes: Switch to a particular branch or revision in the current repository.

commands.name: Branch...
commands.notes: Create a new branch from the currently active branch.

commands.name: Merge...
commands.notes: Start the process of combining the target branch into the active one in the current repository.

commands.name: Tag...
commands.notes: Create a new tag for the active branch and commit in the current repository.

commands.name: View remote
commands.notes: Open the remote server's website (if available) for the current repository.

commands.name: Create pull request...
commands.notes: Start a pull request on the remote server for the current active branch.

commands.name: Open
commands.notes: Open the selected item(s) for the current repository.

commands.name: Open in Terminal
commands.notes: Open a new Terminal window to the directory for the current repository.

commands.name: Quick Look
commands.notes: Display a preview of the selected item(s)'s contents if possible.

commands.name: Add
commands.notes: Add the selected untracked item(s) to the current repository's index, making them available for commit.

commands.name: Remove
commands.notes: Remove the selected item(s) from the current repository's index and on-disk; requires a commit to save.

commands.name: Add / Remove
commands.notes: Combines the Add and Remove actions (see their entries) into a single task for all the selected item(s).

commands.name: Reset... *or* Revert...
commands.notes: Begin reverting in-progress changes for the selected item(s).

commands.name: Log selected...
commands.notes: Show a list of commits specific to the selected item in reverse chronological order.

commands.name: Annotate selected...
commands.notes: Display the contents of the selected item, as lines, with the latest commit's information (author, date, metadata) alongside.

commands.name: Next action...
commands.notes: Begin the next Flow action based on what's currently in progress for the current repository.

commands.name: Header
commands.notes: Wraps the selected text in Markdown syntax for a header.

commands.name: Horizontal rule
commands.notes: Inserts the Markdown syntax for a single line.

commands.name: Bold
commands.notes: Wraps the selected text in Markdown syntax to be **bold**.

commands.name: Italic
commands.notes: Wraps the selected text in Markdown syntax to be *italicized*.

commands.name: Bulleted list
commands.notes: Inserts the Markdown syntax for a bullet at the start of selected text.

commands.name: Numbered list
commands.notes: Inserts the Markdown syntax for a number sequence at the start of selected text.

commands.name: Code block
commands.notes: Wraps the selected text in Markdown syntax to be formatted as code.

commands.name: Link
commands.notes: Wraps the selected text in Markdown syntax for a link, focused to edit the URL portion.
